title: Tara Nikkel and the Dream Mage
description: Tara Nikkel is a thirteen year-old girl with a bit of a problem—she’s dead. That’s not the end of her story though, it’s just the beginning. Join Tara on a fantasy adventure filled with enough goblins, zombies, and laughs to keep you hooked right up to the thrilling conclusion. Ages 13+
author: R.A. Sapp
